features.name: Voice of the Wild
features.enabledFormula: !@modifies:ability:inspire_heroics#bard AND !@modifies:ability:countersong#bard AND !@modifies:ability:bardic_knowledge#bard AND !@modifies:ability:versatile_performance#bard AND !@modifies:ability:jack_of_all_trades#bard AND !@modifies:ability:dirge_of_doom#bard AND !@modifies:ability:inspire_competence#bard

features.name: Daring Champion
features.enabledFormula: !@modifies:ability:mount#cavalier AND !@modifies:ability:mighty_charge#cavalier AND !@modifies:ability:cavaliers_charge#cavalier AND !@modifies:trait:weapon_proficiency#cavalier AND !@modifies:ability:expert_trainer#cavalier AND !@modifies:ability:supreme_charge#cavalier AND !@modifies:trait:armor_proficiency#cavalier

features.name: Feral Hunter
features.enabledFormula: !@modifies:ability:bonus_trick#hunter AND !@modifies:ability:greater_empathic_link#hunter AND !@modifies:ability:improved_empathic_link#hunter AND !@modifies:ability:hunter_tactics#hunter AND !@modifies:ability:speak_with_master#hunter AND !@modifies:ability:teamwork_feat#hunter AND !@modifies:ability:animal_focus#hunter AND !@modifies:ability:precise_companion#hunter AND !@modifies:ability:raise_animal_companion#hunter

features.name: Eldritch Scion
features.enabledFormula: !@modifies:ability:arcane_pool#magus AND !@modifies:ability:spell_recall#magus AND !@modifies:ability:improved_spell_combat#magus AND !@modifies:ability:knowledge_pool#magus AND !@modifies:ability:spellcasting#magus AND !@modifies:ability:spell_combat#magus AND !@modifies:ability:greater_spell_combat#magus

features.name: Wildcat
features.enabledFormula: !@modifies:ability:still_mind#monk AND !@modifies:ability:high_jump#monk AND !@modifies:ability:slow_fall#monk AND !@modifies:ability:abundant_step#monk AND !@modifies:ability:ki_pool#monk AND !@modifies:ability:empty_body#monk AND !@modifies:ability:improved_evasion#monk AND !@modifies:ability:diamond_soul#monk

features.name: Believer's Boon
features.enabledFormula: all(@wis_score>=13,"alignment must be within one step of your deity's")

features.name: Believer's Hands
features.enabledFormula: all(@wis_score>=13,@feat:believers_boon,@alignment:lg,"alignment must be within one step of your deity's")

features.name: Blessed Striker
features.enabledFormula: all(@bab>=11,@trait:divine_spellcaster[Divine spellcaster],"alignment must be within one step of your deity's")

features.name: Channeling Force
features.enabledFormula: all("Ability to cast at least one force spell",@ability:channel_energy[Channel Energy])

features.name: Energy Channel
features.enabledFormula: all(@ability:channel_energy[Channel Energy],"Air, Earth, Fire, or Water domain or blessing")

features.name: Greater Weapon of the Chosen
features.enabledFormula: all(@feat:improved_weapon_of_the_chosen,@feat:weapon_focus#deity,@feat:weapon_of_the_chosen,"Worship and receive spells from a deity")

features.name: Intimidating Performance
features.enabledFormula: any("Ability to start a performance (or raging song) as a move action",@ability:bardic_performance,sum(@ability:raging_song#*)[Raging Song])

features.name: Spontaneous Nature's Ally
features.enabledFormula: all(@skill:knowledge_nature>=5,"Ability to spontaneously cast cure or inflict spells",any(@domain:animal,@domain:plant))

features.name: Weapon of the Chosen
features.enabledFormula: all(@feat:weapon_focus#deity,"Worship and receive spells from a deity")

features.name: Rogue Advanced Slayer Talent and Ninja Master Tricks
